225883318.body:
I'm having a great day & hopefully so are you. So w/o further adoodoo, let's get right to... 
THE MIDDAY STOCK MARKET REVIEW 
( THE FRAUD IS NOT A CRIME IF YOU DON'T HAVE TO PAY A DIME EDITION ) 
 
$LK : One hellava wild ride for the past few weeks. This week bulls are in full control while it looks as if the bears are going vegetarian. And it's only going to get better from here.  
 
$NTEC : A year ago I could tell you I was once in a medically induced coma. This time it's all my fault. 
 
$UBER : Just laid off 14% of its workforce just because most of the employees can't pronounce CEO Dara Khosrowshahi name. Oh, and they still had the money to buy Postmates. They considered buying $BYND, but that Krosroshihannawanna guy said they only deliver REAL food. 
 
$HEXO : I really need this to drop, not because i'm short, but my desire to insult Canada MUST be appeased. 
 
:  )
